verbs.description: LA MALBAIE , Quebec ( AP ) — [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: arrived] [ARGM-TMP: late] [ARGM-PNC: for a gender equality meeting at an international summit] , [ARGM-ADV: prompting Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau to kick it]

LA MALBAIE , Quebec ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] arrived late for a gender equality meeting at an international summit , [V: prompting] [ARG1: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] [ARG2: to kick it]
